original_text: And his allowance was a continual allowance given him of the king, a daily rate for every day, all the days of his life.
korean_text: 그가 쓸 것은 날마다 왕에게서 받는 양이 있어서 종신토록 끊이지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And his allowance was a continual allowance
a daily rate for every day
all the days of his life
